title: Marjayoun Governmental Hospital Upgrades

description: Demolition and reconstruction of regulation-compliant basketball court (PRP program).

description: Rapid conversion to controlled infection isolation ward (Sahet al Abed).

description: Finishing and infrastructure works across hillside residential development phases.
